statements: SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'book';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = '12345';
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM course_materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'video' AND course_id = '54321';
SELECT material_name, material_type, course_id FROM course_materials ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_name = 'Introduction to SQL';
SELECT material_id, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'video';
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type, material_content FROM course_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM lectures
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM lectures
SELECT * FROM assignments
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM assignments
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content, lecture_id FROM lectures
SELECT * FROM lectures WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM lectures WHERE lecture_id = 2;
SELECT lecture_title FROM lectures WHERE lecture_title LIKE '%Introduction%';
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE assignment_id = 3;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM assignments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT title, length, lecturer FROM lectures WHERE length > 60;
SELECT * FROM assignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM assignments WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT title, length FROM lectures WHERE lecturer = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM lectures WHERE length > 60 ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lecturer, COUNT(*) FROM lectures GROUP BY lecturer HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT title, deadline FROM assignments WHERE deadline > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT title, jsonb_array_elements(questions)->>'question' AS question FROM quizzes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, length, lecturer FROM lectures WHERE lecturer IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_description FROM lectures WHERE course_id = '123456';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE deadline > NOW();
SELECT course_name, quiz_name, quiz_date FROM courses INNER JOIN quizzes ON courses.course_id = quizzes.course_id;
SELECT lectures.lecture_id, lectures.lecture_name, courses.course_name FROM lectures JOIN courses ON lectures.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT assignments.assignment_id, assignments.assignment_name, quizzes.quiz_name FROM assignments JOIN quizzes ON assignments.course_id = quizzes.course_id;
SELECT * FROM lectures WHERE lecture_description ILIKE '%introduction%';
SELECT course_name, COUNT(lecture_id) AS lecture_count FROM lectures JOIN courses ON lectures.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_date FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_date > now() ORDER BY quiz_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT title, content FROM assignments WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT id, title, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title, instructor FROM courses WHERE description LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT * FROM lectures ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, content FROM lectures WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT id, description, due_date FROM assignments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title FROM quizzes WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'video' AND upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
